mapper.update: update t_relative_food_pkg set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOODID = #{foodid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PKGID = #{pkgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUANTITY = #{quantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, FOODID, PKGID, QUANTITY from t_relative_food_pkg where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, FOODID, PKGID, QUANTITY from t_relative_food_pkg
